name: Qoder JetBrains Plugin
tagline: Understands your backend's real complexity, not just syntax
description: AI plugin for JetBrains that understands backend projects architecturally. Accesses Spring Bean graphs, database schemas, and framework semantics directly — not just superficial code. Provides context-aware suggestions for complex systems with 100K+ files.

name: Agenta
tagline: Open-source prompt management & evals for AI teams
description: Agenta is an open-source LLMOps platform for building reliable AI apps. Manage prompts, run evaluations, and debug traces. We help developers and domain experts collaborate to ship LLM applications faster and with confidence.

name: Gedd.it
tagline: Find Verified Promo Codes for Products You Want
description: Gedd.it finds and verifies promo codes for the exact product you’re buying. Paste any product link and it automatically searches the web, tests codes in real time, and shows you the one with the best discount. No browser extension needed. It also preserves any existing affiliate links, so creators still get credit.

name: Calk AI 1.0
tagline: AI Agents without nodes headaches
description: AI agents that can automate your work using your data, built to help humans move faster. Connect your tools, describe a task, and agents do the reporting, cleaning, writing, and updating for and with you. No complexity. No workflows. Just agents.

name: hera
tagline: track your period safely
description: Hera is a lightweight period tracker that makes cycle tracking effortless. Log your period, track symptoms, and get clear insights about your hormones in an easy-to-use interface that helps you stay connected to your body on IOS.

name: Product Huntr
tagline: Data analysis platform for Product hunt
description: Discover your next big opportunity with Product Huntr. Analyze 12K+ Product Hunt launches to find validated ideas, market gaps, and untapped opportunities. AI-powered insights for builders and makers.

name: Predictive AI
tagline: Image and Video Enhancement and Analysis Platform
description: Image and Video Enhancement and Analysis Platform. Suite of transformative based AI going beyond current market capabilities, allowing for advanced image and video enhancement and analysis. Already used in courts for defendant early release and prosecution.

name: FraudLens AI
tagline: Detect Fraud Faster with Intelligent Automation
description: FraudLens AI introduces real-time, AI-powered fraud detection that goes beyond rule-based checks. It analyzes large transaction files in chunks, detects duplicates and similarity threats using vector search, and delivers instant alerts with human-readable AI explanations. With API keys, webhooks, async workers, and a full dashboard, it offers faster, smarter, and more actionable fraud insights than traditional tools.

name: Livespace.ai
tagline: Get paid for your designs Every time they’re tried
description: You create stunning spaces, but your best work usually ends up buried in a folder no one ever sees. Livespace.ai fixes that. Upload your designs and they instantly become a global portfolio people can discover, follow, book, and buy from. Your past projects turn into income. Your creativity becomes a brand. Interior designers finally get their own creator platform. Livespace.ai begins now.

name: Livecaster 24×7
tagline: Go live with pre-recorded videos on any platform.
description: Livecaster 24×7 lets you broadcast pre-recorded videos as live and create 24/7 live streams, schedule streams, and even loop videos on autopilot. Perfect for creators, marketers, and businesses who want nonstop visibility, engagement, and sales without the stress of real-time streaming. Go live anytime. Grow faster everyday. Get discovered.

name: Parlay Research
tagline: Smart sports betting insights, served with a pinch of AI
description: Smart insights and analytics for sports betting props. Get AI-powered recommendations for NBA, NFL, MLB, NHL, and Soccer player props.

name: Stac
tagline: Open-source Server-Driven UI framework for Flutter
description: Stac is an open source Server Driven UI framework for Flutter that lets you update app interfaces instantly without rebuilds or store reviews. Build faster, ship experiments easily, personalize UI for users, and keep your app always up to date with clean JSON powered screens.

name: Chronoid
tagline: Automatic time tracking & productivity for macos
description: AI-powered time tracking for macOS with Pomodoro, website blocking, and deep productivity analytics. Privacy-first and fully local.

name: Consistrack
tagline: GitHub for your life goals
description: Grow with Consistrack and get the contribution graph of your life: track your personal and business goals, watch your progress compound with visual feedback, and stay consistent over time.

name: Stack Friday by Prime Club
tagline: The cleanest list of the best SaaS Black Friday Deals
description: We made a list of software and tools that people most frequently pay a monthly/yearly subscription for, checked if they had a Black Friday or Cyber Monday deal going on. ‎ Eliminated every potentially half-baked, low-quality or shady tool. ‎ Aaaand put together a neat-looking list of the top tools with the best deals. ‎ If you love software and tools, this is the ONLY link you need to visit this Black Friday.

name: Micro Deals
tagline: The right app, at the best price.
description: Discover the latest product deals on Microlaunch

name: SynChat: The Native Reddit Matchmaker
tagline: Turn your top 5 subreddits into real connections.
description: SynChat is a native Reddit app that turns your interest graph into real connections. Instead of random encounters, manually select your top 5 subreddits to receive a compatible user recommendation you can DM instantly via standard Reddit Chat. The system features a smart feedback loop: by rating your matches, you train the algorithm to distinguish between shared topics and actual chemistry. It evolves with you to find the people you're looking for, right inside Reddit.

name: SwatchMaker
tagline: See any paints together before you buy
description: SwatchMaker lets you explore thousands of real paint combinations before you ever leave your sofa. No guessing, no expensive mistakes, no drawer full of sample pots you'll never use. How it works • Hit the space bar to shuffle through random colour combinations from real paint brands • Lock colours you love and find the perfect pairing • Upload any image; wallpaper, a photo, artwork—and we'll match the colours to actual paints from Farrow & Ball, Lick, Paint & Paper Library, and more.

name: Managelify
tagline: Project Management, Task Management, Team Communication
description: Managelify is an AI-powered Work Relationship Management platform that unifies project & task management with team and client communication in one clean workflow. Instead of work scattered across WhatsApp, email, Slack and spreadsheets, everything—tasks, messages, files and context—stays connected in one place. Built for freelancers and teams who value clarity over chaos. Stop switching tools and manage work end-to-end in a single platform.

name: DeepSeekMath-V2
tagline: IMO Gold level reasoning, fully open.
description: DeepSeekMath-V2 is a new open-source model specialized in mathematical reasoning. It introduces a self-verification mechanism where the model acts as both generator and verifier to refine its own proofs. It achieved Gold-level scores in IMO 2025 and a near-perfect 118/120 in Putnam 2024.
